DOC.detailed_description: Primary spontaneous pneumothorax commonly occur young , tall , lean male . The estimated recurrence rate 23-50 % first episode increase 60 % second pneumothorax . The pathogenesis benign disease remain unclear . Generally , rupture emphysematous change bleb apex lung consider cause pneumothorax .
